definition: garment/jacket with open slits in place of sleeves

sentences.english: One of the best resumes we've seen, made on a T-shirt.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們見過的最具創意的簡歷之一，體恤衫。

sentences.english: Why did you give us two T-shirts, both the same colour?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼你給我倆買了T恤衫顏色都一樣？

sentences.english: In the summer people dress in casual clothes like T-shirts and shorts.
sentences.chinese: 炎天，人們都穿休閒服裝，如T恤衫和短褲。

sentences.english: Let me know the price of the Tshirts and jackets of the long sleeves.
sentences.chinese: 讓我知道價格的t恤衫和夾克的長袖衫。

sentences.english: There's a black Batman shirt I really like.
sentences.chinese: 有一件黑色的蝙蝠俠T恤衫我很喜歡。

sentences.english: For girls, we have T-shirts in red for only 18yuan.
sentences.chinese: 對女孩來說，我們有紅色體恤衫僅18元。

sentences.english: We provides Winter & Summer Shirts in different styles like, stripes, squares and others.
sentences.chinese: 本公司提供冬夏恤衫，包括直紋，格仔及其他系列。

sentences.english: Learn how to make a custom T-shirt and jeans and fabric spray machine code.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解如何使定製T恤衫，牛仔褲和織物噴碼機。

sentences.english: He puts on his new white T-shirt and yellow cap.
sentences.chinese: 他穿上自己新的白色的體恤衫和黃色的帽子。

sentences.english: We're still got some money left from selling the T-shirts.
sentences.chinese: 我們還剩餘了一些賣T恤衫得來的錢。

sentences.english: We have red and green T-shirts for girls, only 15 yuan each one.
sentences.chinese: 我們有女孩穿的紅色和綠色T恤衫，沒件只15元。

sentences.english: We have T-shirts in red, green and black.
sentences.chinese: 我們出售紅色，綠色和黑色的T恤衫。

sentences.english: Yet, we have taken that phrase, and we have made bumper stickers out of it and t-shirts and everything else.
sentences.chinese: 我們把它製作成汽車保險槓貼紙，T恤衫和其他東西。
第六單元那是誰的T恤衫？

sentences.english: He puts on his new white T-shirt and yellow cap.
sentences.chinese: 他穿上本身新的白色的體恤衫和黃色的帽子。
